evaporation.Tp: Tp should remain above this temperature to start evaporation process. FLOAT
evaporation.mini_cond_wait_time: Time for condinsation if evap temp requirements havnt been met yet. SECONDS
evaporation.evap_wait_time: Time it should take to evaporate. SECONDS
evaporation.Tr_cold: Temperature that Tr should be below e.g. 1. FLOAT
evaporation.extra_evap_time: small time increment that the code will loop over a few times in case evap takes a little longer. SECONDS
evaporation.emergency_cond_wait_time: time it takes to condensate, this is applicable if evap failed, so it tries to recondensate for safety. SECONDS
evaporation.Tr_warm_low_end: Lower end window that Tr should be when cryo has been condensed. FLOAT
evaporation.Tr_warm_high_end: Higher end window that Tr should be when cryo has been condense. FLOAT
evaporation.extra_cond_time: Extra time for condensation if it hasnt met some of these conditions. SECONDS

_comment_condensation.cond_wait_time: Time it should take to condense. SECONDS
_comment_condensation.Tp: Temp that Tp should be above after condensation. FLOAT
_comment_condensation.Tr_warm_low_end: Lower end window that Tr should be when cryo has been condensed. FLOAT
_comment_condensation.Tr_warm_high_end: Higher end window that Tr should be when cryo has been condense. FLOAT
_comment_condensation.extra_cond_time: Extra time in case condensation temperatures havnt been met yet. SECONDS

_comment_cryo_cycle.Tr_cold_abort_temp: If Tr gets above this temperature, full abort system. FLOAT
_comment_cryo_cycle.reseting_time_1: Lower end time window of when the program resets for the day. MINUTES
_comment_cryo_cycle.reseting_time_2: Upper end time window of when the program resets for the day. MINUTES
_comment_cryo_cycle.cond_min_elapsed_time: Minimum time elapsed since condensation started before running evap, because the cryo needs to have enough condensed helium inside. SECONDS
_comment_cryo_cycle.time_within_range: Â± time window when a process should start. MINUTES
_comment_cryo_cycle.evap_monitering_temp: Tr temp check temperature. If during evap, Tr gets above this temp, start cond. FLOAT
_comment_cryo_cycle.cycle_check_time: Time between checks. Checks every x minutes what global time it is to see if it is near a process time. SECONDS
